attributes.action: Call an immediate halt to the UK Investment to the Eurpean Broadcasting Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EBU and the Eurovision Song Contest is a thinly veiled attack from the Eastern European Countries to collude against the western european countries, who have strived to secure their independence and freedom. This is a clear waste of licence payers' money which could be better used in securing top flight sport, UK specific films or a reduction in the licence fee.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
